Shabti votaries are devout clerics of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) who heal and protect their allies while destroying enemies of their faith. Although shabti votaries focus primarily on destroying [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), they remain a potent enemy against living foes. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Shabti Votary](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2424) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 85 **Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34) **Skills** [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +32, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +34, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +34 **Str** +0 **Dex** +1 **Con** +5 **Int** +4 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +31 **Ref** +25 **Will** +34 +2 status to all saves vs. mental and possession **HP** 260 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) **Resistances** [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 15 **Discerning Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 30 feet. All [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) within the aura glow blue, shedding [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) in a 5-foot radius. Visible undead can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while affected by this aura. [Invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) undead are concealed while affected by this aura, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).
**Immortal** Shabtis don't age naturally and can't die of old age. Spells and effects that cause aging still affect a shabti as normal. They also can't be turned into [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
**Gird in Prayer** **Trigger** An ally within the shabti votary's aura is the target of a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), or [_possession_](/Spells.aspx?ID=225) effect; **Effect** The shabti votary girds their ally in protective prayers. The triggering creature gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death, mental, and possession effects until the beginning of the shabti votary's next turn. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _dagger_ +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+18 piercing **Ranged** _dagger_ +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+18 piercing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +36 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Haunting Hymn](/Spells.aspx?ID=924), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **1st** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) (×2) - **3rd** [Enhance Victuals](/Spells.aspx?ID=101), [Ghostly Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=133), [Heroism](/Spells.aspx?ID=149) - **4th** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) - **5th** [Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29) (×2), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) - **6th** [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252), [Remove Paralysis](/Spells.aspx?ID=253), [Scintillating Safeguard](/Spells.aspx?ID=713) - **7th** [Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100) (×2), [Sunburst](/Spells.aspx?ID=326) - **8th** [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Sunburst](/Spells.aspx?ID=326) - **9th** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×5), [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) **Cleric Domain Spells** DC 44, 2 Focus Points - **9th** [Death's Call](/Spells.aspx?ID=413), [Eradicate Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=420) **Rituals** DC 44 - **2nd** [Consecrate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=8) **Cremate Undead** A shabti votary's positive energy sets [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) alight. When a shabti votary uses a [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell to damage undead, each undead that takes damage also takes [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to the spell's level. **Expand Aura** **Frequency** once per turn; **Effect** The shabti votary focuses their will, expanding the area of their discerning aura by 20 feet for 1 minute. This expansion is cumulative with other uses of Expand Aura.
name: Shabti Votary
